Queries.Query:
select RFSCLUSTER "Cluster", RFSLOCALMACHINENAME "Server", RFSQUEUECOUNT "Count"
from pfuser.ReceivedFileStore
where RFSQUEUECOUNT > 500
order by RFSLOCALMACHINENAME
select count(*) from pfuser.mtratranscript where mtatdate > sysdate-1/48

select rmstatus "Status", COUNT(*) "Count"
From pfuser.zlpreceivedmail
Where rmstatus in (0)
Group by rmstatus
Order by rmstatus

select rmstatus "Status", COUNT(*) "Count"
From pfuser.zlpreceivedmail
Where rmstatus in (284)
Group by rmstatus
Order by rmstatus

select rmstatus "Status", COUNT(*) "Count"
From pfuser.zlpreceivedmail
Where rmstatus in (286)
Group by rmstatus
Order by rmstatus

select rmstatus "Status", COUNT(*) "Count"
From pfuser.zlpreceivedmail
Where rmstatus in (5000)
Group by rmstatus
Order by rmstatus
select count(*) from pfuser.indexdocretry where DOCSTATUS=1002
select max(seldoccount) from pfuser.searchengineload where selinstanceid = 9166390

select
    --b.con_ID||' ' con_id,
    b.name, vi.host_name, vi.instance_name ,
    TO_NUMBER(b.total_size)/1024/1024/1024 pdb_total_size_oracle_GB,
    TO_NUMBER(a.max_pdb_storage_val)/1024/1024/1024 MAX_PDB_STORAGE_GB ,
    (b.total_size/a.max_pdb_storage_val)*100 PDBPctFullOracle ,
    TO_NUMBER(a.data_size+b.temp_size)/1024/1024/1024    SumDFSize_GB ,
    ((a.data_size+b.temp_size)/a.max_pdb_storage_val)    *100 as PDBPctFullActual
from

    --database_properties a,
    (select max(max_pdb_storage_val) as max_pdb_storage_val from (
    select to_numbner(decode(property_value,'UNLIMITED',1,NULL,2, property_value)) max_pdb_storage_val
    from database_properties where property_name ='MAX_PDB_STORAGE' union select 3 max_pdb_storage_val from dual
    )) a,
    v$pdbs b ,
    (select sum(bytes) data_size from dba_data_files ) a ,
    (select nvl(sum(bytes),0) temp__size from dba_temp_files ) b ,
    v$instance vi

select
    --b.con_ID||' ' con_id,
    b.name, vi.host_name, vi.instance_name ,
    TO_NUMBER(b.total_size)/1024/1024/1024 pdb_total_size_oracle_GB,
    TO_NUMBER(a.max_pdb_storage_val)/1024/1024/1024 MAX_PDB_STORAGE_GB ,
    (b.total_size/a.max_pdb_storage_val)*100 PDBPctFullOracle ,
    TO_NUMBER(a.data_size+b.temp_size)/1024/1024/1024    SumDFSize_GB ,
    ((a.data_size+b.temp_size)/a.max_pdb_storage_val)    *100 as PDBPctFullActual
from

    --database_properties a,
    (select max(max_pdb_storage_val) as max_pdb_storage_val from (
    select to_numbner(decode(property_value,'UNLIMITED',1,NULL,2, property_value)) max_pdb_storage_val
    from database_properties where property_name ='MAX_PDB_STORAGE' union select 3 max_pdb_storage_val from dual
    )) a,
    v$pdbs b ,
    (select sum(bytes) data_size from dba_data_files ) a ,
    (select nvl(sum(bytes),0) temp__size from dba_temp_files ) b ,
    v$instance vi

query: SELECT 100 - ROUND((b.total_size / a.max_pdb_storage_val) * 100, 2) AS PDBPCTFULLACTUAL FROM (SELECT TO_NUMBER(DECODE(property_value, 'UNLIMITED', NULL, property_value)) AS max_pdb_storage_val FROM database_properties WHERE property_name = 'MAX_PDB_STORAGE' AND property_value != 'UNLIMITED') a, v$pdbs b;
